content.rendered:
Directed by Aswin Raam

Written by Hiphop Tamizha Adhi. Pon Parthiban. Aswin Raam. Aswin Raam. G. Radhakrishnan

Star Hiphop Tamizha Adhi (Anbu / Arivu). Kashmira Pardeshi (Kayal (as Kashmira Pardesi)). Shivani Rajashekar (Yazhini). Napolean (Muniyandi). Sai Kumar (Prakasham). Asha Sharath (Lakshmi). Vidharth (MLA Pasupathi). Arjai (Singaram). Dheena (Dheena). Sanjeev Venkat (DSP Naresh Pandian (as Sanjeev)). Sharath Ravi (Venkat). G. Marimuthu (Kayal’s Father). Jeeva Ravi (Collector of Madurai). Aadukalam Naren (Jayaprakasam). Vinod Sagar (Doctor). Vincent Mordente (Anbu (voice)). Renuka (Arivu’s aunt)

Language Tamil

Producers Emin Guliyev. T.G. Thyagarajan

Production Sathya Jyothi Films
